rewrite1: In the fourth paragraph, apply a wavy underline for emphasis. Then, change the left indent to negative 2 centimeters and set the indentation for the first line to 2 characters.
rewrite2: For the fourth paragraph, apply a wavy underline for emphasis. Then alter the left margin by setting the indentation to negative 2 centimeters, and adjust the indentation of the first line to correspond with two characters.
rewrite3: In the fourth paragraph, apply a wave-style underline. Then, change the left margin by setting the indentation to negative 2 centimeters, and alter the first line indent to 2 characters.
